page.title: 13N. Bransholme, housing.
page.content:
The residents where asked if{they {preferred: Yes(%) No(%) a){new house to old }85 15 b){where they now live }21 79 { c){where would they preferred to live? % Wouldn't move 36.5 Elsewhere in Hull 48.5 Elswhere in Britain 9.0 Abroad 6.0
The houses are built in{'Closes' around grass areas. They form terraces punctuated by archways and garage/ parking areas. Some have three stories for larger families. There are also blocks of pensioners bungalows and one or two older houses, pre-Bransholme estate.
